name: To the Light (itch) (Andrew)
description:
Use light to find a way out.
Only visible items exist.
What plunges into darkness disappears until the light returns.

Pick up, carry, throw, and follow lights to create a path to the exit.

Controls:
[WASD] or arrows to move,
[E] to pick up or drop light,
[R] or [Backspace] to restart if stuck.

Made with Unity, C# language.

Thanks for playing!
